preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 1800 g of Barium Carbonate using a digital scale. 
 2. Measure 300 g of Calcium Carbonate. 
 3. Measure 1200 g of Manganese Oxide. 
 4. Combine all three ingredients in a large mixing bowl. 
 5. Mix thoroughly using a spatula or a mechanical mixer to ensure uniform distribution of particles.
